channel.title: Carin León on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Carin León on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Carín León Becomes First Latino Artist to Headline Las Vegas’ Sphere, Shows Set for 2026
item.description: Carín León is set to become the first Latino artist to play at Las Vegas’ Sphere, with three dates scheduled for next year. León will head over to Sin City to perform at the venue on Sept. 11-13

item.title: Carín León Becomes First Latino Artist to Headline Las Vegas’ Sphere, Shows Set for 2026
item.description: Carín León is set to become the first Latino artist to play at Las Vegas’ Sphere, with three dates scheduled for next year. León will head over to Sin City to perform at the venue on Sept. 11-13

item.title: Carin León Tapped as First Latin Act to Play the Sphere
item.description: León will play three shows in September 2026 as part of Las Vegas’ Mexican Independence Day celebration.
